data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Laurent Soldati, Fabien L. Condamine, Anne-Laure Clamens, Gael J. Kergoat (2017): Documenting tenebrionid diversity: progress on Blaps Fabricius (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Tenebrioninae, Blaptini) systematics, with the description of Fve new species. European Journal of Taxonomy 282: 1-29, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2017.282
